item.title: CBIC will take up industry bodies' complaints of non-reduction in prices, says chairman

bullets: Recounting the experience in the earlier years of GST rollout, Agarwal said even though there was a mechanism to file complaints regarding profiteering, not
An anti-profiteering authority was also set up, wherein consumers can file complaints, along with bills or invoice receipts, regarding any non-reduction in prices post
Under the anti-profiteering mechanism, only 704 cases were registered with the authority, and 60 per cent of the cases were initiated within the first
The total profiteering amount that was alleged was ₹4,362 crore in 704 cases.
